inclusion.criterion: Somatic state compatible with the evaluation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Functional language and IQ ≥ 80 for the transfer tests
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent signed by the holders of parental authority, the patient and the mother for her own participation (DNA collection)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Affiliation to Social Security (beneficiary or assignee)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The primary endpoint will be the overall score to the AQ (Autism Quotient) questionnaire and to the SRS (Social Reciprocity Scale), in comparison to the expected scores for the general population.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Additional condition associated with an autism spectrum disorder
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Turner syndrome not related to an homogeneous 45,X karyotype
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome, short stature, delayed puberty and developmental delay. She is treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy.
